NCL
===

# Available modules


The overview below shows which NCL installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using NCL, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load NCL/6.6.2-intel-2019b
```
